oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Turkish Tourist Trade Refined.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Archive of Turkish Oral Narrative (Texas Tech University)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Uysal, Ahmet Edip.
Walker, Warren S.
Walker, Barbara K.
Texas Tech University. Archive of Turkish Oral Narrative.
Folklore--Turkey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Five page transcript of Turkish oral narrative story No. 2023 titled "Turkish Tourist Trade Refined." The folktale was narrated on March 2, 1998 and is part of the Archive of Turkish Oral Narrative.

Oral narrative of a Turkish folktale collected by Professor Ahmet Edip Uysal, Dr. Waren Walker and Barbara Walker (Mrs. Warren Walker). Each narrative was translated into English by native Turkish speakers (mostly students), paid for by the Walkers, who then edited the translations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: The images in this collection are for study purposes, teaching, classroom projection and research only. Permission to publish these digital files in any form must be obtained from the Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library, Texas Tech University, 806-742-9070 or email reference.swco@ttu.edu.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digitized by the Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library.
